channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #es @ 1447028392939986948
item.description:
Me gustaría revisar el #OpenData de las plantas de oxígeno a nivel nacional para revalidar este tema.
Me llama mucho la atención que se indique que Lima Metropolitana tenga 50 distritos ¿Desde cuándo? Tengo entendido que son 43.
Bueno, veamos #OpenData https://t.co/95G6Ff9dBz https://t.co/UONxlLzRlc

item.title: #en @ 1447011512535687170
item.description: we are out tonight and will be out this upcoming week as well, have a splendid Saturday night folks... will check messages, mentions and push some retweets when able during the week... Refer to the pinned tweet for links to the various open data sources...

item.title: #ja @ 1446854049253396482
item.description:
【2021年10月08日 九州地方の火山性地震】
九重山1回 (10/5 1回) 阿蘇山159回 219⤵︎⚠️⚠️ 霧島山(えびの高原(硫黄山)周辺)2回→ 霧島山(新燃岳)3回↗︎‼️‼️ (10/6 1回) 桜島 3回 1↗︎‼️‼️ 薩摩硫黄島 6回 4⤴︎❗️ 口永良部島 9回→※注 諏訪之瀬島 25回 48⤵︎
https://t.co/on808GLfue ﾒﾓ https://t.co/FfamSnwjhD

item.title: #en @ 1446846100284051462

item.title: #fr @ 1446817253262086144
item.description: @smetsjp @JeromeColombain @gchampeau @babgi @clever_cloud Je veux bien une définition du cloud à la ramasse ? Un cloud qui laisserait ses clients exposés à des failles grave comme Azure ? Qui planterait sur 6h comme Facebook ? Ou qui pratique l’open data radical comme twitch et aws ?

item.title: #en @ 1446793368915349508
item.description: 17/ Let us be clear. We will not submit to intimidation. Help us fight back with open data and facts against regime-led misinformation and sectarian politicking. Read our full open letter: https://t.co/96nibU7GC3 #right2info

item.title: #de @ 1446789961232044039
item.description: .@BrinkmannLab u @Karl_Lauterbach heben bei #besseronline @DJVde wichtige Arbeit von #datenjournalismus #DDJ #dataviz hervor. #Lauterbach wünscht sich auf meine Frage mehr #OpenData u Aufarbeitung suboptimaler Datenlage öffentl. Stellen #EvidenceAct @OpenGovGermany @opengovpart https://t.co/RbZnONKyL0

item.title: #fr @ 1446733704093646850
item.description: Le saviez vous, alors qu’aux dernières municipales la Mairie avait promis de planter 100.000 arbres pendant sa mandature, son open-data met au contraire en évidence une perte de 1.000 arbres en 2 ans. Un nouveau #MensongePoliticien pour les présidentielles ? https://t.co/LyuSbT3GUE

item.title: #en @ 1446600930439356422
item.description:
If you're wondering why Houston lags behind other cities in publishing open data and engaging communities around public tech projects, I wrote this piece for you.
Thank you @RDAHouston for helping shine a light on these issues in our city! https://t.co/1YRK5yJP1N https://t.co/o8ty8b3eEt

item.title: #en @ 1446593367526318085
item.description: Now on Cite Digital, Katya Abazajian @katyaabaz, examines the City of Houston’s open data processes and finds them to be lagging behind those of other cities. She examines the many reasons why this is a difficult task in Houston. Read her analysis, https://t.co/Tq2NvFQ1NI. https://t.co/RWNgG2sjTJ

item.title: #pt @ 1446572960492527620
item.description: Sabia que nós temos o 1º banco de dados abertos de violência armada do Brasil e o único da América Latina sobre o tema? A plataforma é de fácil acesso e pode ser consultada em tempo real. Nela você confere dados sobre tiroteios, baleados, e muito mais! https://t.co/yAKCtKpqzv https://t.co/xsNNDO7EwQ

item.title: #en @ 1446570687309746176
item.description:

We're doing "A Software or Data Engineer's Introduction to Confidence Intervals" using @chicago #OpenData on municipal repairs and how long they took 😈
And it's POSSIBLE we... https://t.co/e0R0NkuPjx

item.title: #nl @ 1446495533179281414
item.description: Open Data inspireert om andere onderzoekers hun data en protocols ook open te maken. Onze phd student @DFilioglou & Safoora Kamjan zijn pioniers in dit voor de gebieden waar ze werken. Ik ben zeker dat we zullen straks meer #opendata krijgen ook van andere onderzoekers

item.title: #en @ 1446478129439158273
item.description:
Congrats to @shellyrauvola for this awesome work!🎉
This paper has it all:
- Theoretical integration and empirical demonstration! - Preregistered hypotheses/methods! - Open data/code! - Cross-validation in a holdout sample! - Results that question long-held assumptions! https://t.co/atEffEGvb2

item.title: #en @ 1446477719445938183
item.description: The lack of open, official energy data makes it harder to solve the climate crisis. It's good to see our friends at @OurWorldInData are on the case. See https://t.co/sorj3MxLMn for more info and how you can help https://t.co/I6g8JKeqRs

item.title: #cs @ 1446384874630361089
item.description: #seminare Koncem září se uskutečnil výroční seminář České meteorologické společnosti. Dominantními tématy byla Kvalita ovzduší, Open data, Monitoring sucha a další. Na setkání byla nově zvolená předsedkyně RNDr. Taťána Míková, která vystřídala doc. RNDr. Tomáše Halenku, CSc. https://t.co/CleEV6rLKl

item.title: #th @ 1446383831385141249
item.description:
เพราะพวกเราเชื่อในรัฐโปร่งใส จึงจัดทำข้อมูลเปิด (Open Data) ให้ประชาชนติดตามสอดส่องการทำงานของพวกเราได้:
https://t.co/3mCXLO8D7e
ยอมรับว่ายังมีอีกหลายจุดในเขตบางแคที่ผมไม่เคยเข้าไป แต่สัญญาว่าผมจะพยายามอย่าเต็มที่เพื่อ
#ไปให้ถึงก่อนยุบสภา
(inbox จุดแนะนำเข้ามาได้เลยครับ!) https://t.co/6mklsvv9S5

item.description: Yesterday's #UNWDF2021 panel, "Citizen-generated data for COVID-19 response: Incorporating open data in micro-planning for vaccine equity," offered an insightful look into how #OpenStreetMap has been used around the world to facilitate Covid responses. https://t.co/tIgPtM3zml

item.title: #es @ 1446221811277045760
item.description: La filtración de datos conocida como Pandora Papers –hasta ahora sin acceso como #datosabiertos- reveló que el bufete creaba empresas "offshore" para multinacionales y millonarios. El #ICIJ la califica como una de las firmas más grandes con lobby e influencia legislativa global. https://t.co/7IrfZbdxu9

item.title: #en @ 1446205063408521222
item.description:
Strongly endorse the call from @MaxCRoser and @_HannahRitchie for @IEA to make their high-resolution energy data publicly accessible.
In a world where data is power, it is unjust to keep critical energy data hidden behind steep paywalls. https://t.co/4iQqh0E1uk

item.title: #en @ 1446202164255338496
item.description: Excellent discussion on the politics, possibilities and problems of open data at #4S2021 with @Honoluluskye @adkhandekar @MarcelLaFlamme_ @acorsin @krystaltibbet @otsuki3c @eSTSjournal @catalyst_sts @TapuyaLASTS @STS_Journal plus many others. THANK YOU!

item.title: #en @ 1446193186599313413
item.description: .@Twitter just launched prompts intended to remind users there's a human being on the other end of abusive comments. It's a good move, but just one part of the puzzle. We also need evidence and open data about how well such interventions work. A thread.

item.title: #en @ 1446174242282905605
item.description: The new Insect Brain Database brings together varied formats of insect neuroscience data in an open, easy to use online database, helping researchers find related work, reuse existing data, and build an open data culture https://t.co/jcJl2s764c https://t.co/ejxWb1boqN

item.title: #en @ 1446151023727452160
item.description:
My new post with ⁦@_HannahRitchie⁩ is out.
We are trying to improve the situation of the @IEA.
The title is: ‘The IEA publishes the detailed, global energy data we all need, but its funders force it behind paywalls. Let’s ask them to change it.’ https://t.co/a66ub5z5aU

item.title: #en @ 1446145738581368837
item.description:
Governments including #UK are forcing the IEA to charge for access to data that is holding back research into climate change - easy one for #COP26Glasgow, release the data that the tax payer are paying for. @OurWorldInData
https://t.co/kCHEHytezd

item.description: Latest study suggests: in 2021 the richest two deciles (top 20 percentiles together) on average are expected to recover nearly half of their 2020 losses, while the poorest two deciles on average are expected to further lose 5% of their income. Learn more: https://t.co/a4zfT9lWVH

item.title: #en @ 1446082400233168898
item.description:
100% agree.
At @EmberClimate we spend soooo much time collecting national data that the @IEA has but keeps behind a paywall. TBF, the IEA is getting sooo much better, but still a long to go.
The world needs #opendata. Please give it to us, IEA!
https://t.co/pvJQRPqKaI https://t.co/K2NFwVKMPT
